name: Sprintball X2
description:
The Sequel To A Fast Paced Platformer Sprintball X
Sprintball X2 Is Fast And The Levels Are Made To Be For Speed.
Be Careful Though, Enemies Might Kill You If Your Not Careful.
Controls:
A and D - Move Left And Right
When In Blue Pad Press Space And A To Jump Off To The Left Side
When In Orange Pad Press Space And D To Jump Off To The Right Side
Space To Jump
Aim With Your Mouse And Left Click To Shoot
